explanation: [0-0] A person in white clothing is sitting barefoot on a wooden platform. On the platform, there is a small white bowl containing some food. In front of the person, there is a large metal plate filled with half a plate of meat and some broth. The person is holding a spoon in their right hand, hovering above the plate.
[0-3] Next, the person scoops up some broth with the spoon and pours it into the bowl next to them.

[3-7] Subsequently, the person holds the bowl in their left hand over the metal plate and uses the spoon in their right hand to scoop a spoonful of red liquid from the right side and pours it into the bowl.

[7-17] Afterward, the person places the bowl on the wooden platform with their left hand and then picks up a bone from the right side with the same hand. They continuously tap the bone on the plate, extracting a bit of white bone marrow from the hole in the bone. Then, they tap the plate twice with the spoon in their right hand and continue tapping inside the plate with the bone, this time extracting more bone marrow. Subsequently, they use the spoon in their right hand to scoop the bone marrow from the plate into the bowl next to them and toss the bone in their left hand onto the ground.
